thread.title: Tuesday’s Travel News: Dining in Peru; Jewelry in Bali
thread.title_full: Tuesday’s Travel News: Dining in Peru; Jewelry in Bali - The New York Times

author: Shivani Vora
title: Tuesday’s Travel News: Dining in Peru; Jewelry in Bali
text:
Our weekday morning digest that includes consumer news, deals, tips and anything else that travelers may want to know.
A NEW GUIDE TO FOOD IN PERU
Peru is getting new attention for its growing food scene, and the online guide published this week called “Culinary Travel in Peru” highlights the best places in the country to experience the culture. Published by the Lima-based custom trip outfitter Aracari Travel, the 100-page ebook can be downloaded for free on any tablet, computer or phone and is organized by region, including Lima, Cusco, the north and south coasts and the Amazon. Recommendations range from high-end dining to hole-in-the-wall local hangouts, and there is a glossary on Peruvian ingredients and dishes.
IN NEW YORK, BUY A TICKET, BE THE STAR
In Transit Travel news, deals and tips, written by the editors and reporters of the Travel section.
